name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-oriented Python Developer with extensive proficiency in **Python**, **PostgreSQL**, **SQL**, and **Git** for efficient coding and version control. Skilled in using **GitLab** for streamlined collaboration, and experienced in deploying applications on **Azure** and **AWS** cloud platforms. Adept in CI/CD practices and containerization with **Docker**, ensuring high-quality automated deployments. Strong background in Agile and Scrum methodologies to enhance team productivity. Additionally, I have a proven track record in designing scalable and user-centric applications across diverse sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, emphasizing automation and robust architecture.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** to develop high-performance backend services, enhancing system efficiency and scalability.
Implemented robust database solutions using **PostgreSQL** and **SQL**, ensuring data integrity and optimized querying processes, resulting in a 50% reduction in data retrieval times.
Employed **Git** and **GitLab** for version control and collaborative development, streamlining project workflows and achieving a 30% increase in team productivity.
Integrated cloud services on **AWS** and **Azure** to enhance deployment flexibility and system reliability, with a focus on achieving more than 99% uptime.
Established automated **CI/CD** pipelines, cutting deployment cycles by 70% through effective use of tools such as GitHub Actions and Jenkins.
Led **Agile** and **Scrum** teams, ensuring timely delivery of project milestones and fostering a collaborative work environment, improving sprint completion rates by 40%.
Containerized applications using **Docker**, improving cross-environment consistency and accelerating development cycles by 60%.
Administered **Linux** servers, ensuring system security and efficiency for production workloads.

Utilized **Python** for backend development, enhancing application performance and scalability.
Managed data storage and retrieval with **PostgreSQL**, optimizing query performance for data analysis with a 15% speed improvement.
Implemented version control and collaborative features using **Git** and **GitLab**, increasing code quality and team productivity by 30%.
Employed **AWS** for cloud deployment and **Docker** for containerization, reducing environment conflicts and setup time by 50%.
Adopted **CI/CD** practices to streamline deployment workflows, achieving a deployment frequency increase by 40% and reducing errors by 20%.
Configured and managed **Linux** servers, ensuring system security and efficiency for application hosting.
Participated in **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies, improving project delivery timelines by 25%.

Utilized **Python** to develop scalable backend solutions, ensuring high availability and performance.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitLab** and **Docker**, optimizing deployment processes and achieving a deployment frequency of 12 times per month.
Managed databases using **PostgreSQL**, performing complex SQL queries to support data-driven applications, and maintaining data integrity with **99% accuracy**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile/Scrum** environment, facilitating sprint planning and retrospectives to enhance team productivity.
Deployed applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, leveraging cloud services for reliability and scalability, achieving a reduction in infrastructure costs by **20%**.
